tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InsuranceInformation (
  insurance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  policy_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  provider VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  coverage_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE BillingInformation (
    billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    service_code INT,
    service_date DATE,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE InsuranceInformation (
    insurance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    insurance_provider VARCHAR(100),
    policy_number VARCHAR(20),
    coverage_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FinancialReporting (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    total_billed DECIMAL(10, 2),
    total_paid DECIMAL(10, 2),
    balance_due DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE Reimbursement (
    reimbursement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    claim_id INT,
    reimbursement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    reimbursement_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE billing_info (
    bill_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    bill_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    bill_date DATE NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE insurance_info (
    insurance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    insurance_company VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    policy_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    policy_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE patient_info (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    dob DATE NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    address TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE financial_report (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_bill_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    total_payment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE reimbursement (
    reimbursement_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    claim_date DATE NOT NULL,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    reimbursement_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);
